properties.entry: SELECT CART_NO , CART_STOCK , ITEM_PRICE , ITEM_PRICE * (1 - ITEM_DISCOUNT) AS DISCOUNTPRICE , (ITEM_PRICE * CART_STOCK) AS TOTAL_PRICE , (ITEM_PRICE * (1 - ITEM_DISCOUNT) * CART_STOCK) AS TOTAL_DISCOUNT_PRICE , (ITEM_PRICE * CART_STOCK) - (ITEM_PRICE * (1 - ITEM_DISCOUNT) * CART_STOCK) AS DIFFERENCE_PRICE , C.MEMBER_NO AS MEMBERNO , ITEM_NAME FROM CART C, ITEM I, MEMBER M WHERE C.ITEM_CODE = I.ITEM_CODE AND C.MEMBER_NO = ?
